pages.text: The hardest boss in Terramity. Does not fit into progression.$(br2)He can be summoned by striking the super sniffer with lightning while he's in phase 2 and under 10% of his max health.$(br2)Recommended Gear:$(br) -End game gear (Read last page)

A solid and flat arena is absolutely necessary for this fight, using blocks with high durability (like obsidian) is recommended.$(br2)Use blockades or pillars made out of durable blocks to stop his lasers.

The strongest boss in Terramity. Nigh-unkillable, it's not recommended to take him on. If you decide to anyway, you'll be rewarded with some of the best gear in the game. Bring high mobility accessories and powerful weapons or armor.
